revision.text: {{Talkheader}} {{ArticleHistory |action1=GAN |action1date=16:51, 11 July 2015 (UTC) |action1link=Talk:Sieges of Taunton/GA1 |action1result=listed |action1oldid=670970395 |dykdate=16 April 2015 |dykentry=... that during the second '''[[Sieges of Taunton|siege of Taunton]]''', [[Robert Blake (admiral)|Robert Blake]] declared that he "had four pairs of boots left and would eat three of them before he yielded"? |currentstatus=FA |topic=Warfare |action2=WAR |action2date=01:06, 30 July 2015 (UTC) |action2link=Wikipedia:WikiProject Military history/Assessment/Sieges of Taunton |action2result=approved |action2oldid=673343249 |maindate= 23 September 2016 |action3=FAC |action3date=2015-08-20 |action3link=Wikipedia:Featured article candidates/Sieges of Taunton/archive1 |action3result=promoted |action3oldid=674695243 }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Somerset|class = FA|importance=mid}} {{MILHIST|class = FA|A-Class=pass|b1=y|b2=y|b3=y|b4=y|b5=y|British=y|Three-Kingdoms=y}} }} == Congratulations == Congratulations on making it to today's listing on the "Did You Know..." section of Wikipedia Main Page. The process of making it the listing takes a bit of effort and involves the quick cooperation of many editors. All involved deserve recognition, appreciation, thanks and applause. :Best Regards, ::  [[User:Bfpage|Bfpage]] |[[User talk:Bfpage|leave a message]]  21:09, 16 April 2015 (UTC) Yes this all truth... [[User:Safdar Husaini|Safdar Husaini]] ([[User talk:Safdar Husaini|talk]]) 10:01, 23 September 2016 (UTC)
